summary: This bill, the "Improving Care in Rural America Reauthorization Act of 2025," reauthorizes several rural healthcare programs. It amends Section 330A of the Public Health Service Act regarding rural health care services outreach, rural health network development, and small health care provider quality improvement grant programs. The amendments focus on ensuring funds are used to serve rural underserved populations and increase access to quality healthcare. It extends the authorization period for these programs from 2021-2025 to 2026-2030.
